_comment: REFRESH_RATE: how many seconds between checks on the server side for updates
VLC_HOST: if flask and vlc run on the same machine, you can set 127.0.0.1 to block direct vlc web access
VLC_ADDR: should be localhost if flask and vlc run on the same host, or the IP of the vlc host e.g. 192.168.0.10 or pi.local
VLC_USER: I think this should always be empty but I'm not sure...
VLC_PASSWORD: this config file will be available on http://<<host>>:<<FLASK_PORT>>/config move your password inside python if you want more security
